title: Issue History: Add read API for issue_history timeline (ordered, paginated, permissioned)

sections.text: Implement backend endpoints/service methods to fetch an Issue’s `issue_history` events in a stable chronological order with pagination/cursor support for UI timeline rendering. Ensure events are returned with normalized actor metadata and minimal, consistent payload shapes per event type (status, priority, merge/split, note, external link). Apply access control consistent with Issue visibility and add basic tests for ordering, pagination, and redaction where applicable.
